reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's color, describing it as a perfect little black dress, and appreciate its fit, comfort, and quality. The material is soft and stretchy, with one customer noting it feels like a glove. While some customers find the dress opaque, others mention it may be see-through, and opinions about sizing are mixed, with some saying it runs true to size while others find it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy lil blk dress
items.body: Love this dress great fit and I like the finger holes for my thumbs Read more
items.author: Adaniels

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute !
items.body: Very surprised that it’s decent quality. It is stretchy. I weigh about 135 pounds and I am 5‘2“ and I bought the medium as Amazon suggested and it fits perfect. I love it, my daughter told me it’s probably her favorite dress that I’ve gotten so far. And you know kids don’t lie lol!! I’m not gonna lie on you. I originally had a couple other very similar dresses in my shopping cart, but I decided to just read the reviews and I stuck with this one and I’m glad that I did because nobody wants to go through the hassle of having to return something that isn’t like how it shows in the pictures. It’s a good black dress. You can definitely dress it up or be more casual, depending on your sense of style. Read more
items.author: Sarah Torres

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Babes, get this.
items.body: SUPER CUTE! It gave everything i needed it to. Read more
items.author: t davis

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Basic Runs Large
items.body: The material is a bit thin. If you want a skintight fit like I wanted, definitely size down. As a tall girl, the length was perfect to be a respectable mini though. For reference I am 6’ tall 175lbs and ordered a medium. A small (maybe even XS) would have been much better so I’m returning it. Read more
items.author: This was a great buy!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfortable
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I never really rate anything, but this dress was perfect. Super soft and stretchy. Yes it’s white so of course it’s a bit see through. But with the right undergarment you’ll be fine. Now I want it in other colors. I got a Medium. I’m 5’6 and 156lbs Read more
items.author: Eva Westin

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed.
items.body: 5’2” 145lbs 36DD Purchased the red in a size S. It is not red however more of a dark salmon pink red. It is not a mini and not stretchy at all. Could not get my arms through it due to my bust size. Smelled like perm solution only stronger. I don't get headaches but this smell was chemically harsh! Maybe I'd of washed it and kept it (provided the smell had come out), had it also been a mini as pictured however I am only 5’2”, and it was stretchy so as to fit into it. It appears though to slightly have the puffy shoulder and skirt look as it appears on the picture. Had to send it back. I just saw that this review was added to a different dress! My review is about the WDIRARA deep v neck, puff sleeve, high rise flare dress. Not sure why they are showing turtleneck bodycon mini red club dress?! Read more
items.author: Anonymous 29

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it
items.body: Fits to my body Read more
items.author: Nese

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad not great.
items.body: Definitely longer than what I had thought and it does rise up. Color is same in the picture. Doesn’t have shape u easily throw on belt give it more shape easy fix. U can easily throw shorts under it or some leggings. Material is thin not see through. It is not club dress !longer 5/7 length it is if u wearing bike shorts tall and skinny. Just ok not bad wish they would of made it shorter other than that no problems. Probably wouldn’t buy it again. Gave it 3 stars just ok to high price and quality is cheap. Read more
items.author: Emily

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee, Dark Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
